com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.language_translation.v2
Class LanguageTranslation

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
      com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.language_translation.v2.LanguageTranslation

public class LanguageTranslation
extends WatsonService

The IBM Watson Language Translation service translate text from one language to another and identifies the language in which text is written.

Version:
v2
Author:
German Attanasio Ruiz (germanatt@us.ibm.com)
See Also:
Language Translation

translate

public TranslationResult translate(Map<String,Object> params)
Translate paragraphs of text using a model and or source and target. model_id or source and target needs to be specified. If both are specified, then only model_id will be used

Parameters:
params - the params
Returns:
The TranslationResult
